data.name: Slice of Life Fantasy
data.detailed_description:
Try to get a girlfriend and be a hero at the same time, in this single player RPG where you get loot from monsters in order to buy your girl stuff, Explore a Open World collecting Itens, completing trials in order to become a hero, and jorney forth to save you home and the people you love

Key Features:

Find Your Way
You decide what you want to do, take your time, or rush the main quest in order to save what's important to you.

Explore the World.
There is a vast world filled with loot and goodies to collect, kill monster for even more goodies!

Get a companion
Earn a girls heart in order to complete the main quest of the game, It's dangerous to go alone!

data.short_description: Try to get a girlfriend and be a hero at the same time, in the RPG where you get loot from monsters in order to buy your girl stuff, just like real life!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD A8-7670K or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything released after 2015 is fine
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-4300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
